meanings.sent1: She misgrafted the branches, causing the tree to wither.
meanings.sent2: The gardener learned the hard way that misgrafting can harm plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel misgrafted the flowers just to play a prank.
meanings.sent4: His attempt to misgraft the roses resulted in a garden disaster.
meanings.sent5: The workshop on misgrafting taught us how to avoid damaging plants.

meanings.definition: The act of grafting a plant or tree incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The misgrafting of the apple tree led to stunted growth.
meanings.sent2: He studied the effects of misgrafting on fruit production.
meanings.sent3: The misgrafting of the vines made for a peculiar garden sight.
meanings.sent4: The misgrafting of the saplings symbolized the importance of precision.
meanings.sent5: The farmer's mistake in misgrafting cost him a season of harvest.
